body:
Hello everyone I check the results of LadyBug radiationAnalysis component with energy plus result for Surface Outside Face Incident Beam Solar Radiation Rate per Area [W/m2](Hourly) . I have checked the energy plus InputOutputReference and the explanation for this output variable is : 1.9.45.13
Surface Outside Face Incident Beam Solar Radiation Rate per Area [W/m2]
The solar beam radiation incident on the outside of an exterior surface, including the effects of shadowing, if present. The beam here is that directly from the
sun; it excludes beam specularly reflected from obstructions. Dose radiationAnalysis calculate the same thing?can any one explain ?
topic: why LadyBug radiationAnalysis and energyplus differ in results?
